column4: Hi.  I can't run glxgears.  X Error of failed request:  BadRequest (invalid request code or no such operation);  Major opcode of failed request:  143 (GLX) ...  I have Intel 82945G/GZ graphics, and the xorg log says that I'm using thexserver-xorg-video-intel driver.
Search for EnvyNG, it does a great job at installing the Nvidia drivers correctly for you
I don't have an nvidia video card.  I have an Intel video card.
Ahh my bad! not sure then :)
